message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $150 for the product.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product for $165. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.

I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $157.50. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a final price of $150 for the product.
